adjectives.description: leisured (comparative more leisured, superlative most leisured)

entries.meaning: Having leisure time, especially as a result of not having to work for a living.
examples: They had become a superior, leisured caste.
And brooding thus on my ephemeral flowers
That smoulder in the wilderness, I thought,
Of amaranths that burn in lordly bowers,
Of men divinely blessed with leisured hours,
